website_summaries.verdict: People are generally happy with the Puma Silverion. This neutral running shoe is welcomed because of its versatile looks, its comfortable foam heel platform, and secure collar design. On the other hand, the irritating inner sleeve and the restrictive forefoot have been criticized.Fans of Puma’s offerings for neutral pronation and road adventures can enjoy the Silverion.
pros: Some users have noted that the lightweight structure of the Puma Silverionhas permitted all-day use
Several individuals claim that the aesthetics of this running shoe allow it to be used in any activity, not just running
The cushioning in the heel part is welcomed because of its capacity to deliver comfort during the foot-strike
Based on a handful of reviews, the padded collar works well as a preventive measure against accidental shoe removals
The surface grip is appreciated by those who like responsible movement control over the ground
cons: A few people have noted that the forefoot section of the foot-chamber is a bit restrictive
The inner sleeve has irritated the skin of some users’ feet

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 9.5 and the Puma 9.5 fit perfect. I like the Puma styling.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: they looked great on my computer, when I got them and tried them on, they did not seem as great, but an okay, a nice pair of shoes. very hard shoe, was very surprised of how stiff and hard this shoe actually is I guess I got what I paid for to all fairness, I NEVER CONTACTED THE SELLER
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Alexis Campos

customer_reviews.title: Im gonna order 2 more pair I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Good quality. Well made. An not some cheap knock off like some others I have bought. Shoe size was pretty dead on. They are a narrow shoe. That's just how puma is so don't be afraid to order a Wide if you have any doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Matt  Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Styling and profiling
customer_reviews.text: Shors are made real well and fit very comfortable and look pretty awesome my son loves them
customer_reviews.author: JAMES GRANGER JR

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as good in person and very comfortable. Unfortunately, I received the wrong size initially. However, second time is the charm. Very pleased now.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: great fit if you like BALERINA SLIPPERS!
customer_reviews.text: ive worn size 13 for most of my life and my feet are not really that wide. these things are SLIM AND SHORT - love the look but there is NO WAY this is a 13 regular as its marked
customer_reviews.author: 2ndEmpireMedia

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Great shoes. Looking forward to future purchases when my size is in stock
customer_reviews.author: B. Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he loves them. They are exactly as described great sporty look.
customer_reviews.author: April lindsell

customer_reviews.title: This model of shoe, true to size
customer_reviews.text: The insoles are comfy, colors are cool, and the overall fit is good
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking
customer_reviews.text: We picked this pair of sneakers as a gift for our father and they look awesome! We really liked them, I could even say that they look even better in person also it's made of a good quality of material.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size up for better width.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 medium, I bought a 10.5 because I didn't want them too tight for the width. This worked. The width is perfect for a half size up. It is like walking on air. Thanks Puma!!!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit very nice and I get alot of comments.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great and my husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Durable. These are my husband's baseball "Coach" shoes. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Stepheny Trumpower

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow in the toe.
customer_reviews.text: These run small compared to other Pumas I have had in the past But they are comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D Knox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Not for a wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He said, they are tight around the upper feet of the shoes. His feet are not wide either. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and they are by far his favorite shoes. They fit great and weren’t extremely expensive like in the stores. We will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but run small, made for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful shoe only thing is that a bit tight!! Not for wide feet. Should have gotten two sizes larger. Size not to standard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: The three pair I received were all tighter than usual but other than that I like them. You might want a half size bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sizing!!!! I wear an 11.5, I ORDERED a 12.5, it fits like an 8.5 VERY UNSATISFACTORY
customer_reviews.author: wayho

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting shoe i have ever had.i have found me a new brand of shoes. Thanks puma and amazon
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect and are true to size, they are also extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is very poorly made. Had 3 days and seems are coming apart. Appearance and comfort is great.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend. They are now his everyday shoe. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Silverion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The silver i on takes the momentum we have in viz-tech and continues it Forward. The tooling features the classic tazon tool With foam bubble in the heel. Rubber coverage on the outsole provides traction and control. the upper features a bold design language, allowing for mixed material options and bright color blocking. Synthetic leather overlays combined with meshes creates for an impactful upper allowing the opportunity for trend relevant color blocking or commercial, tonal colorways. Bold cat branding on the lateral quarter panel showcases the PUMA brand.
